column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Lou Malnatis has a great personal pan deep dish pizza lunch special. From 11:00am - 2:00pm everyday you can go in and get a pizza
column2: salad and pop all for under $8. I don't know where else you can get this much food for less than $10. Their pizza is always pretty good. If you want something good and fast check out Lou's for lunch!
